Package fr.cnrs.iees.uit.indexing

Interface IndexingTree<T,​N extends fr.cnrs.iees.uit.indexing.IndexingNode<T,​N>>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of objects indexed
N - the type of node used to build this tree
All Superinterfaces:
Dimensioned, fr.ens.biologie.generic.Sizeable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractIndexingTree, BoundedRegionIndexingTree, ExpandingLimitedPrecisionIndexingTree, ExpandingRegionIndexingTree, LimitedPrecisionIndexingTree, RegionIndexingTree
public interface IndexingTree<T,​N extends fr.cnrs.iees.uit.indexing.IndexingNode<T,​N>> extends Dimensioned, fr.ens.biologie.generic.Sizeable

The base interface for an indexing tree.

Classes implementing this interface are meant to index objects in space using a tree structure, like binary trees, quad-trees and octrees. This interface is the root of the hierarchy.

Author:
Jacques Gignoux - 07-08-2018

  • Method Details

    • root

      N root()
      Returns:
      the tree root node

    • insert

      void insert​(T item, Point at)

      Insert an object in the tree at a given location

      Parameters:
      item - the object to insert
      at - the location where to insert it.

    • getNearestItem

      T getNearestItem​(Point at)

      Get the item closest to location.

      CAUTION: will pick the first item encountered if two or more items are found exactly at the same distance of the argument.

      Parameters:
      at - the location
      Returns:
      the item closest to this location

    • getNearestItems

      default Collection<T> getNearestItems​(Point at)

      Get the items closest to location.

      Will pick all the items found at exactly the same distance of the argument.

      Parameters:
      at - the location
      Returns:
      the list of items closest to this location

    • remove

      boolean remove​(T item)
      Remove item and adapts the tree structure to the removal if needed.
      Parameters:
      item - the item to remove
      Returns:
      true if item successfully removed

    • getItemsWithin

      Collection<T> getItemsWithin​(Box limits)
      Get all items within a Box contained in the tree space.
      Parameters:
      limits - the Box in which to search for items
      Returns:
      the list of items contained in the Box

    • getItemsWithin

      Collection<T> getItemsWithin​(Sphere limits)
      Get all items within a spherical region contained in the tree space.
      Parameters:
      limits - the Sphere in which to search for items
      Returns:
      the list of items contained in the Sphere

    • getAllItems

      Collection<T> getAllItems()
      Get all items of this tree in a flat list
      Returns:
      the list of all items contained in the tree

      void clear()
